post.body:
We are delighted to let you know Alzahra Studio is finalizing several scenes for Cobra , an Indian movie directed by R. Ajay Gnanamuthu!
The story involves a genius mathematician who commits crimes using math.
We are working on several surrealistic shots with lots of particles and explosions!
Stay tuned for more info!
